channel.title: Portfolio on Andre Duarte | Software Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Andre Duarte | Software Developer

item.title: Manus DevTools
item.description: Manus DevTools is a software tool developed by MANUS Meta to assist in configuring and animating models using the Manus Core.

item.title: Incal
item.description: This project came from the need to have some WebGL integrated in my portfolio website.

item.title: Theremin
item.description: From Inspiration to Collaboration The story of VR theremin began with a serendipitous interaction on Twitter.

item.title: Shopping COVID
item.description: Shopping COVID is game about going shopping in the middle of a pandemic.

item.title: HoopsVR
item.description: From Basic Prototype to VR Hoops This VR basketball game, HoopsVR, wasn’t built from scratch!

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Exploring Superpowers in VR The project was born from a long-standing curiosity: What would it feel like to possess superpowers in the immersive world of Virtual Reality (VR)?

item.title: Checkers GL
item.description: This project was the final project of the discipline “Intelligent Systems” while I was studying in ISEC.

item.title: Billiard GL
item.description: This project was the final project of the discipline “Computer Graphics II” while I was studying in ISEC.
